name: Column
description: DataTable requires a value as an array of objects and columns defined with Column component.

column-key.label: columnKey
column-key.title: Identifier of a column if field property is not defined.

sort-field.label: sortField
sort-field.title: Property name to use in sorting, defaults to field.

filter-field.label: filterField
filter-field.title: Property name to use in filtering, defaults to field.

sortable.label: sortable
sortable.title: Defines if a column is sortable.

style.label: style
style.title: Inline style of header, body and footer cells.

class.label: class
class.title: Style class of header, body and footer cells.

header-style.label: headerStyle
header-style.title: Inline style of the column header.

header-class.label: headerClass
header-class.title: Style class of the column header.

body-style.label: bodyStyle
body-style.title: Inline style of the column body.

body-class.label: bodyClass
body-class.title: Style class of the column body.

footer-style.label: footerStyle
footer-style.title: Inline style of the column footer.

footer-class.label: footerClass
footer-class.title: Style class of the footer body.

show-filter-menu.label: showFilterMenu
show-filter-menu.title: Whether to display the filter overlay.

show-filter-operator.label: showFilterOperator
show-filter-operator.title: When enabled, match all and match any operator selector is displayed.

show-clear-button.label: showClearButton
show-clear-button.title: Displays a button to clear the column filtering.

show-apply-button.label: showApplyButton
show-apply-button.title: Displays a button to apply the column filtering.

show-filter-match-modes.label: showFilterMatchModes
show-filter-match-modes.title: Whether to show the match modes selector.

show-add-button.label: showAddButton
show-add-button.title: When enabled, a button is displayed to add more rules.

filter-match-mode-options.label: filterMatchModeOptions
filter-match-mode-options.title: An array of label-value pairs to override the global match mode options.

max-constraints.label: maxConstraints
max-constraints.title: Maximum number of constraints for a column filter.

exclude-global-filter.label: excludeGlobalFilter
exclude-global-filter.title: Whether to exclude from global filtering or not.

filter-header-style.label: filterHeaderStyle
filter-header-style.title: Inline style of the column filter header in row filter display.

filter-header-class.label: filterHeaderClass
filter-header-class.title: Style class of the column filter header in row filter display.

filter-menu-style.label: filterMenuStyle
filter-menu-style.title: Inline style of the column filter overlay.

filter-menu-class.label: filterMenuClass
filter-menu-class.title: Style class of the column filter overlay.

selection-mode.label: selectionMode
selection-mode.title: Defines column based selection mode, options are "single" and "multiple".

expander.label: expander
expander.title: Displays an icon to toggle row expansion.

colspan.label: colspan
colspan.title: Number of columns to span for grouping.

rowspan.label: rowspan
rowspan.title: Number of rows to span for grouping.

row-reorder.label: rowReorder
row-reorder.title: Whether this column displays an icon to reorder the rows.

row-reorder-icon.label: rowReorderIcon
row-reorder-icon.title: Icon of the drag handle to reorder rows.

reorderable-column.label: reorderableColumn
reorderable-column.title: Defines if the column itself can be reordered with dragging.

row-editor.label: rowEditor
row-editor.title: When enabled, column displays row editor controls.

frozen.label: frozen
frozen.title: Whether the column is fixed in horizontal scrolling.

align-frozen.label: alignFrozen
align-frozen.title: Position of a frozen column, valid values are left and right.

exportable.label: exportable
exportable.title: Whether the column is included in data export.

export-header.label: exportHeader
export-header.title: Custom export header of the column to be exported as CSV.

export-footer.label: exportFooter
export-footer.title: Custom export footer of the column to be exported as CSV.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

slots.name: header
slots.title: Custom content for the component's header

slots.name: body
slots.title: Custom content for the component's body

slots.name: footer
slots.title: Custom content for the component's footer

slots.name: editor
slots.title: Custom content for the editing cell

slots.name: filter
slots.title: Custom content for the filtering items

slots.name: filterheader
slots.title: Custom content for the filter menu's header

slots.name: filterfooter
slots.title: Custom content for the filter menu's footer

slots.name: filterclear
slots.title: Custom content for the filter menu's clear section

slots.name: filterapply
slots.title: Custom content for the filter menu's apply section

slots.name: loading
slots.title: Custom loading template.

slots.name: rowtogglericon
slots.title: Custom row toggler icon template.

slots.name: rowtogglericon
slots.title: Custom row toggler icon template.

slots.name: rowcheckboxicon
slots.title: Custom row checkbox icon template.

slots.name: roweditoriniticon
slots.title: Custom row editor init icon template.

slots.name: roweditorsaveicon
slots.title: Custom row editor save icon template.

slots.name: roweditorcancelicon
slots.title: Custom row editor cancel icon template.

slots.name: filtericon
slots.title: Custom filter icon template.

slots.name: filterclearicon
slots.title: Custom filter clear icon template.

slots.name: filterremoveicon
slots.title: Custom filter remove icon template.

slots.name: filteraddicon
slots.title: Custom filter add icon template.

slots.name: sorticon
slots.title: Custom sort icon template.

slots.name: headercheckboxicon
slots.title: Custom header checkbox icon template.

slots.name: rowreordericon
slots.title: Custom row reorder icon template.
